en_US.help_del: Deletes the last game from memory
en_US.description_werbinich: Starts a Who am I?. After a registration phase, I assign every player a random other player to whom they may assign a name. The (spoiler-free) result is distributed to every participant.
en_US.description_status: Shows the current phase of Who am I?. This contains information about which participants did not submit their assignments yet.
en_US.description_fertig: Declares the end of a game. This makes the results available for participants
en_US.description_del: Deletes the last game and its results from memory.
en_US.options_werbinich:
Optionen:
  geheim - The participants do not know which participant assigned which assignment.
en_US.registering: A Who am I? wa started! To participate, register with a {} reaction. You have {} {}.
en_US.ask_for_entry: You may select a name for {}. Which one is it going to be?
en_US.list_title: All participants are done. They submitted the following:
en_US.already_running: There already is a game running.
en_US.dm_blocked: One of my functions blocks the DM channel of {}. Unfortunately, I cannot begin the game.
en_US.postgame_unauthorized: This command is only available for participants of the last game.
en_US.no_spoiler: I'm not going to spoiler you.
en_US.show_running: There is a game running, please be patient.
en_US.show_not_found: There was no game so far.
en_US.past_game_in_mem: The last game took place in {}.
en_US.status_registering: I am still waiting for registrations ({} seconds remaining).
en_US.status_delivering: I am currently distributing the results.
en_US.status_aborting: I am currently aborting a game.
